text: peechhe rah jaanevaale allaah ke rasool ke peechhe apane baith rahane par prasann hue. unhen yah naapasand hua ki allaah ke maarg mein apane maalon aur apanee jaanon ke saath jihaad karen. aur unhonne kaha, "is garmee mein na nikalo." kah do, "jahannam kee aag isase kaheen adhik garm hai," yadi ve samajh paate (to aisa na kahate)
